summary: An ordinance providing for the laying off, opening, extending and establishing of Lorentz Place, from the south margin of West Wheeler Street to a point approximately two hundred two (202) feet north therefrom; providing for the condemnation, appropriation, taking and damaging of land and other property necessary therefor; and for providing that the entire cost of improvement shall be paid by special assessment upon the property specially benefited, in the manner provided by law.
